General.Name: Marshall Machines Limited
General.Description: Marshall Machines Limited develops, manufactures, and markets machine tool equipment in India. It offers compact single spindle machines, twin spindle machines, rigidturn machines, and heavy duty single spindles for shafts, as well as patented double and four spindle CNC machines, automated robotic solutions, and patent pending IoTQ suit of intelligent equipment. The company also provides linear tooling machines, smartload solutions, and turret type machines; special solutions for hard turning; and intelligent solutions with clap and clamp. It also exports its products. Marshall Machines Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Ludhiana, India.
